participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, Arjun loves to explore new ideas and experiences.
participant_1.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, Maya enjoys making the most of her time with family and pets.
participant_2.background: i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm married to a doctor. i am a professional tennis player. my family is continuously growing. i live in a three storey house.
